abstract: The police released surveillance video of a woman who they say has walked off with four purses hanging on the back of chairs at Katz's and at Clinton Street Baking Company nearby.
snippet: The police released surveillance video of a woman who they say has walked off with four purses hanging on the back of chairs at Katz's and at Clinton Street Baking Company nearby.
lead_paragraph: If she had simply had her hand in the pickle jar at one place - or if she had stuck a finger in the maple-butter dish at the other - this would be a different story, and probably more delectable.

headline.main: Someone Is Stealing Purses at Katz's Deli
